report.name: OK_01062007_maj_reftrans

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT r.NUMSEQ NUMSEQ, r.CODGROUP CODGROUP, r.NOMGROUP NOMGROUP, r.CODEDP CODEDP, r.SIGDP SIGDP, r.PID PID, r.PTYPE PTYPE, r.CODCAMO CODCAMO, r.LIBPROJET LIBPROJET, r.CHEFPROJET CHEFPROJET, r.CUMULJH CUMULJH, r.CONSOJH CONSOJH, r.FACINT FACINT, r.REESTJH REESTJH, r.PROPOJH PROPOJH, r.PROPOMOJH PROPOMOJH, r.NOTIFJH NOTIFJH, r.ARBITJH ARBITJH, r.PROPOJHN1 PROPOJHN1, r.PROPOMOJHN1 PROPOMOJHN1, r.METIER METIER, decode(r.METIER,'ME ',1, decode(r.METIER,'MO ',2, decode(r.METIER,'HOM',3,4) ) ) ORDER_METIER, a.CODCAMO1 CODCAMO1, decode(a.CODCAMO1,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo1)) as CLIBCA1, a.CODCAMO2 CODCAMO2, decode(a.CODCAMO2,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo2)) as CLIBCA2, a.CODCAMO3 CODCAMO3, decode(a.CODCAMO3,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo3)) as CLIBCA3, a.CODCAMO4 CODCAMO4, decode(a.CODCAMO4,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo4)) as CLIBCA4, a.CODCAMO5 CODCAMO5, decode(a.CODCAMO5,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo5)) as CLIBCA5, a.CODCAMO6 CODCAMO6, decode(a.CODCAMO6,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo6)) as CLIBCA6, a.CODCAMO7 CODCAMO7, decode(a.CODCAMO7,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo7)) as CLIBCA7, a.CODCAMO8 CODCAMO8, decode(a.CODCAMO8,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo8)) as CLIBCA8, a.CODCAMO9 CODCAMO9, decode(a.CODCAMO9,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.codcamo9)) as CLIBCA9, a.CODCAMO10 CODCAMO10, decode(a.CODCAMO10,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = a.CODCAMO10)) as CLIBCA10, p.CODCAMO1 CODCAMO11, decode(p.CODCAMO1,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = p.codcamO1)) as CLIBCA11, p.CODCAMO2 CODCAMO12, decode(p.CODCAMO2,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = p.codcamO2)) as CLIBCA12, p.CODCAMO3 CODCAMO13, decode(p.CODCAMO3,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = p.codcamO3)) as CLIBCA13, p.CODCAMO4 CODCAMO14, decode(p.CODCAMO4,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = p.CODCAMO4)) as CLIBCA14, p.CODCAMO5 CODCAMO15, decode(p.CODCAMO5,0,null,(select ca.clibca from centre_activite ca where codcamo = p.CODCAMO5)) as CLIBCA15 FROM tmpreftrans r, ligne_bip lb, proj_info p, application a WHERE r.numseq = :p_numseq AND r.pid = lb.pid AND lb.icpi = p.icpi AND lb.airt = a.airt &P_WHERE order by CODGROUP, ORDER_METIER,CODEDP, PTYPE, PID
dataSource.comment: Cette edition a deux laoyouts. Leurs donnees sont casiment le meme. La seconde edition est une synthese de la premiere. Dans la premiere, on n'a pas les totaux pour le departement pole.

textSegment.string: Code Projet(P0000) ou Code Appli(A0040) ou
